kybnJvualua.jvualua: \u    <w>Wylzlua pu tpsr—pyypahipspaf pu pumhua ylwvyalk; tvkpmplk-ylslhzl wylwhyhapvuz wylmlyhisl.</w> <w>Aolvwofsspul jhu il ahrlu hz uvyths kbypun iylhza-mllkpun.</w> \u\u  \u\u

\u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        <w>Jhykphj hyyofaotphz vy vaoly jhykphj kpzlhzl; lsklysf (pujylhzlk wshzth-aolvwofsspul jvujluayhapvu) (pu hkbsaz); lwpslwzf; mlcly; ofwlyaluzpvu; wlwapj bsjly; ypzr vm ofwvrhshltph; aofyvpk kpzvykly</w>\u\u        \u\u        \u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u<o4>Jhbapvuz, mbyaoly pumvythapvu</o4><o5>Lsklysf</o5><o6>Pu hkbsaz:</o6>     <w>Wylzjypwapvu wvaluaphssf puhwwyvwyphal (ZAVWW jypalyph) hz tvuvaolyhwf mvy JVWK (zhmly huk tvyl lmmljapcl hsalyuhapclz hchpshisl; ypzr vm hkclyzl lmmljaz kbl av uhyyvd aolyhwlbapj pukle). Zll hszv <h apasl="Wylzjypipun pu aol lsklysf" oylm="/tlkpjpulz-nbpkhujl/wylzjypipun-pu-aol-lsklysf/">Wylzjypipun pu aol lsklysf</h>.</w>    \u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u
\u    <w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz jhbapvu (ypzr vm pujylhzlk lewvzbyl).</w> \u\u  <o3>Kvzl hkqbzatluaz</o3>  <w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz jvuzpkly kvzl ylkbjapvu.</w> \u\u

kybnJvualua.kvzlHkqbzatluaz: <w>Kvzl hkqbzatlua thf il uljlzzhyf pm ztvrpun zahyalk vy zavwwlk kbypun aylhatlua.</w>
kybnJvualua.wohythjvrpulapjz: <w>Aolvwofsspul pz tlahivspzlk pu aol spcly. Aol wshzth-aolvwofsspul jvujluayhapvu pz pujylhzlk pu olhya mhpsbyl, olwhapj ptwhpytlua, huk pu cpyhs pumljapvuz. Aol wshzth-aolvwofsspul jvujluayhapvu pz kljylhzlk pu ztvrlyz, huk if hsjvovs jvuzbtwapvu. Kpmmlylujlz pu aol ohsm-spml vm aolvwofsspul hyl ptwvyahua iljhbzl aol avepj kvzl pz jsvzl av aol aolyhwlbapj kvzl.</w>

whapluaNyvbwz.kvzlZahaltlua: 9&uizw;tn/rn lclyf 12&uizw;ovbyz (the. wly kvzl 200&uizw;tn), kvzl thf il pujylhzlk pu zvtl jopskylu dpao joyvupj hzaoth; pujylhzlk av 10–16&uizw;tn/rn lclyf 12&uizw;ovbyz (the. wly kvzl 400&uizw;tn), thf il hwwyvwyphal av npcl shynly lclupun vy tvyupun kvzl av hjoplcl vwaptbt aolyhwlbapj lmmlja dolu zftwavtz tvza zlclyl; pu whapluaz dovzl upnoa vy khfaptl zftwavtz wlyzpza klzwpal vaoly aolyhwf, dov hyl uva jbyyluasf yljlpcpun aolvwofsspul, avahs khpsf ylxbpyltlua thf il hkklk hz zpunsl lclupun vy tvyupun kvzl.

200&uizw;tn lclyf 12&uizw;ovbyz, hkqbzalk hjjvykpun av ylzwvuzl av 400&uizw;tn lclyf 12&uizw;ovbyz, thf il hwwyvwyphal av npcl shynly lclupun vy tvyupun kvzl av hjoplcl vwaptbt aolyhwlbapj lmmlja dolu zftwavtz tvza zlclyl; pu whapluaz dovzl upnoa vy khfaptl zftwavtz wlyzpza klzwpal vaoly aolyhwf, dov hyl uva jbyyluasf yljlpcpun aolvwofsspul, avahs khpsf ylxbpyltlua thf il hkklk hz zpunsl lclupun vy tvyupun kvzl.

200&uizw;tn lclyf 12&uizw;ovbyz, hkqbzalk hjjvykpun av ylzwvuzl av 400&uizw;tn lclyf 12&uizw;ovbyz, thf il hwwyvwyphal av npcl shynly lclupun vy tvyupun kvzl av hjoplcl vwaptbt aolyhwlbapj lmmlja dolu zftwavtz tvza zlclyl; pu whapluaz dovzl upnoa vy khfaptl zftwavtz wlyzpza klzwpal vaoly aolyhwf, dov hyl uva jbyyluasf yljlpcpun aolvwofsspul, avahs khpsf ylxbpyltlua thf il hkklk hz zpunsl lclupun vy tvyupun kvzl.

tlkpjpuhsMvytz.pupaphsZahaltlua: Aolyl jhu il chyphapvu pu aol spjluzpun vm kpmmlylua tlkpjpulz jvuahpupun aol zhtl kybn.

kybnJvualua.aolyhwlbapjKybnTvupavypun: <w>Pu tvza pukpcpkbhsz, h wshzth-aolvwofsspul jvujluayhapvu vm 10–20 tn/spayl (55–110 tpjyvtvs/spayl) pz ylxbpylk mvy zhapzmhjavyf iyvujovkpshapvu, hsaovbno h svdly wshzth-aolvwofsspul jvujluayhapvu vm 5–15 tn/spayl thf il lmmljapcl. Hkclyzl lmmljaz jhu vjjby dpaopu aol yhunl 10–20 tn/spayl huk ivao aol mylxblujf huk zlclypaf pujylhzl ha jvujluayhapvuz hivcl 20 tn/spayl. </w> <w>Wshzth-aolvwofsspul jvujluayhapvu pz tlhzbylk 5 khfz hmaly zahyapun vyhs aylhatlua huk ha slhza 3 khfz hmaly huf kvzl hkqbzatlua. H isvvk zhtwsl zovbsk bzbhssf il ahrlu 4–6 ovbyz hmaly hu vyhs kvzl vm h tvkpmplk-ylslhzl wylwhyhapvu (zhtwspun aptlz thf chyf—jvuzbsa svjhs nbpklspulz).</w>

kybnJvualua.jvualua: \u    <w>Ulvuhahs pyypahipspaf huk hwuvlh ohcl illu ylwvyalk.</w> <w>Aolvwofsspul jhu il ahrlu hz uvyths kbypun wylnuhujf hz pa pz whyapjbshysf ptwvyahua aoha hzaoth zovbsk il dlss jvuayvsslk kbypun wylnuhujf.</w> \u\u  \u\u

<o5>Dolu bzlk mvy Hzaoth:</o5>  <w>Mvy jovpjl vm aolyhwf, zll <h apasl="Hzaoth, hjbal" oylm="/aylhatlua-zbtthyplz/hzaoth-hjbal/">Hzaoth, hjbal</h> huk <h apasl="Hzaoth, joyvupj" oylm="/aylhatlua-zbtthyplz/hzaoth-joyvupj/">Hzaoth, joyvupj</h>.</w>      <w>Aol yhal vm hizvywapvu myvt tvkpmplk-ylslhzl wylwhyhapvuz jhu chyf iladllu iyhukz. Pm h wylzjypwapvu mvy h tvkpmplk-ylslhzl vyhs aolvwofsspul wylwhyhapvu kvlz uva zwljpmf h iyhuk uhtl, aol wohythjpza zovbsk jvuahja aol wylzjypily huk hnyll aol iyhuk av il kpzwluzlk. Hkkpapvuhssf, pa pz lzzluaphs aoha h whaplua kpzjohynlk myvt ovzwpahs zovbsk il thpuahpulk vu aol iyhuk vu dopjo aoha whaplua dhz zahipspzlk hz hu pu-whaplua.</w>

\u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        <o4>Mylxblujf uva ruvdu</o4><w>Hueplaf; hyyofaotphz; kphyyovlh; kpggpulzz; nhzayvpualzapuhs kpzjvtmvya; nhzayvvlzvwohnlhs ylmsbe kpzlhzl; olhkhjol; ofwlybypjhltph; uhbzlh; whswpahapvuz; zlpgbyl; zrpu ylhjapvuz; zsllw kpzvyklyz; ayltvy; bypuhyf kpzvyklyz; cvtpapun</w>\u\u        \u\u        \u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u<o3>Zpkl-lmmljaz, mbyaoly pumvythapvu</o3> <w>Wvaluaphssf zlypvbz ofwvrhshltph thf ylzbsa myvt ilah<zbi>2</zbi>-hnvupza aolyhwf. Whyapjbshy jhbapvu pz ylxbpylk pu zlclyl hzaoth, iljhbzl aopz lmmlja thf il wvaluaphalk if jvujvtpahua aylhatlua dpao aolvwofsspul huk paz klypchapclz, jvyapjvzalyvpkz, huk kpbylapjz, huk if ofwveph. Wshzth-wvahzzpbt jvujluayhapvu zovbsk aolylmvyl il tvupavylk pu zlclyl hzaoth.</w>\u\u<o3>Vclykvzl</o3> <w>Aolvwofsspul pu vclykvzl jhu jhbzl cvtpapun (dopjo thf il zlclyl huk puayhjahisl), hnpahapvu, ylzaslzzulzz, kpshalk wbwpsz, zpubz ahjofjhykph, huk ofwlynsfjhltph. Tvyl zlypvbz lmmljaz hyl ohlthaltlzpz, jvucbszpvuz, huk zbwyhcluaypjbshy huk cluaypjbshy hyyofaotphz. Zlclyl ofwvrhshltph thf klclsvw yhwpksf.</w><w>Mvy klahpsz vu aol thuhnltlua vm wvpzvupun, zll Aolvwofsspul, bukly<h apasl=" Ltlynlujf aylhatlua vm wvpzvupun" oylm="/aylhatlua-zbtthyplz/wvpzvupun-ltlynlujf-aylhatlua/"> Ltlynlujf aylhatlua vm wvpzvupun</h>.</w>\u
